description.content: Home page of Ianis Vasilev's personal website.

bio.content: My name is Ianis Vasilev. Briefly, I am a computer programmer with a mathematical education.

website_description.content: This is my personal website. It is dedicated to creations I want to share with the general public that don't properly belong elsewhere.

page_list_prefix.content: There are a few distinct sections:

website_code.content: Additionally, for me this website was a massive learning opportunity for many low-level details of web development. I have implemented much from scratch; enough to feel contented and share the code in a [GitHub repository](${projectUrl}).
